Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery vessel, the interior is slightly ribbed and bears faint traces of three lines of black-painted demotic text, the exterior is covered with a thin grey-brown slip.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394970) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394970)
